body: another fun sorting would be investments to committees held. id love to see the banking committee buying fintech, defense buying MSFT/LMT, and so on and so on

I work as a receptionist and we are REQUIRED to ask all new clients to give us their CC number and the expiration date over the phone in order for them to book an appointment with us. It's super unsafe, but per our 24hr cancellation and no-show policy we have to have a card on file to protect our LMT's from getting ripped off. You can always book online though and it's 100x safer, we can't even see these card numbers, just the last 4 digits.
